videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 129 g (4.6 oz) (with battery and SD memory card)
meteringmode: Matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
chargingtime: Approx. 2 h 40 min (when using Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when no charge remains)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (with  battery case), Charging AC Adapter EH-70P, USB Cable UC-E6, ViewNX 2  CD-ROM, Reference Manual (CD-ROM)
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous (up to 6 images are taken  at a rate of about 1.1 fps), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
monitor: 6.7 cm (2.7-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating, and 5-level brightness adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 25 MB) SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 s and 2 s
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 96.8 x 57.8 x 20.5 mm (3.9 x 2.3 x 0.9 in.) (excluding projections)
speed: 1/2000-1 s 4 s (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
focallength: 4.7-32.9mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 26-182 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
construction: 8 elements in 8 groups (1 ED lens element)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 1m  (3 ft 4 in.) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 5 cm (2 in.) to infinity  (wide-angle position) (All distances measured from center of front  surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Sound files (Voice Memo): WAV Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant)
focusareaselection: Face priority, auto (9-area automatic selection), center, manual with 99 focus areas, subject tracking
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech,  Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi,  Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian,  Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian,  Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical (compared to actual image)
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene (Scene auto selector, Portrait, Landscape, Sports,  Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night  landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy,  Backlighting, Panorama assist, Pet portrait), Special effects, Smart  portrait
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; total pixels: approx. 20.48 million
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 728 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
movie: 720/30p (default setting): 1280 x 720/16:9/approx. 30 fps,  480/30p: 640 x 480/4:3/approx. 30 fps, 240/30p: 320 x 240/4:3/approx. 30  fps
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical (compared to actual image)
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 80-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
